NiftiHeaderUnreadable.message:
We were unable to parse header data from this NIfTI file.
Please ensure it is not corrupted or mislabeled.

GzNotGzipped.message: This file ends in the .gz extension but is not actually gzipped.

BvalMultipleRows.message: .bval files should contain exactly one row of volumes.

BvecNumberRows.message: .bvec files should contain exactly three rows of volumes.

NiftiTooSmall.message: This file is too small to contain the minimal NIfTI header.

OrphanedSymlink.message:
This file appears to be an orphaned symlink.
Make sure it correctly points to its referent.

FileRead.message:
We were unable to read this file.
Make sure it contains data (file size > 0 kB) and is not corrupted,
incorrectly named, or incorrectly symlinked.

BvecRowLength.message: Each row in a .bvec file should contain the same number of values.

BFile.message:
.bval and .bvec files must be single space delimited
and contain only numerical values.

JsonSchemaValidationError.message: Invalid JSON file. The file is not formatted according the schema.

NoValidDataFoundForSubject.message: No BIDS compatible data found for at least one subject.

WrongNewLine.message:
All TSV files must use Line Feed '\n' characters to denote new lines.
This files uses Carriage Return '\r'.

MalformedBval.message: The contents of this .bval file are undefined or severely malformed.

SidecarWithoutDatafile.message: A json sidecar file was found without a corresponding data file.

MissingSession.message: Not all subjects contain the same sessions.

InaccessibleRemoteFile.message:
This file appears to be a symlink to a remote annexed file,

and *.vmrk) are broken or some files do not exist.
